__e: My husband Rufus and my son Eric.
I love Rufus and Lily, and I wish they were my parents.
Well, without Rufus and your mother in your life, I thought you could use the support.
And now that Rufus and I aren't together, well, I thought you two might be.
But, God, Rufus, it can't be real, because, I mean, if it is, the things that it says that I'm going to do...
Rufus... I don't know you that well. But in the last two days, you helped us break out of jail.
